column9: NOTE about "Elective" course requirements:  When completing a double major or two degree plan of study, it is not necessary to be specific on any "Electives" unless the class to be taken to fill an elective is required for one of the majors.  This will allow you more flexibility in scheduling and avoid the need to later file a revised plan of study.  If a specific course is listed to fulfill an elective, that specific course must then be taken.

column9: May need to include rest elective, MA elective, and/or MA/SCI elective
to have sufficient MA/Sci credits for 2nd major. Depends on
ABET Requirements for Engineering Courses 2nd major
For 2018-2019: 72 credit hours of engineering courses
For 2019-2020: 68 credit hours of engineering courses
For 2nd major, must have a 12-credit capstone design sequence or
appropriate substitution for EP415, EP416, and EP417.
These electives may need to be filled as indicated if not
filled with appropriate courses from the primary major.
The total number of science, math, and engineering credits
must be satisfied as indicated in the notes above.
